newsitem.title: CHINA: China November CPI 6.9 percent yr/yr-official.
newsitem.headline: China November CPI 6.9 percent yr/yr-official.

text.p: China's consumer price inflation rose 6.9 percent in November compared with the year-ago period, the State Statistical Bureau said on Wednesday.
That compared with a year-on-year increase of 7.0 percent for October.
Retail price inflation, the figure China uses as its benchmark for nationwide inflation, was 4.6 percent in November.
Consumer price inflation in the cities was 7.4 percent while rural price rises were 6.4 percent in November, the bureau said in its monthly report.
